refnamediv.refpurpose: This function restores the selected region in an image using the region neighborhood.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
src = imread(location-for-image) x = [x1 x2 ...........xn ] //x coordinates of polygon covering the region that you want to fill y = [y1 y2 ...........yn ] //corresponding y coordinates of polygon covering the region that you want to fill dstImg 1= regionFill(srcImg,inpaintRadius,x,y)
mask = roiFreeHand(srx) //making a mask - you can also use other function to make the mask dstImg2 = regionFill(srcImg,inpaintRadius,mask)

listitem.para: input source imge //it is converted to 8 bit internally
Radius of a circular neighborhood of each point inpainted that is considered by the algorithm(Double)
Inpainting mask. Non-zero pixels indicate the area that needs to be inpainted.
1xn matrix denoting x coordinates of polygon covering the region that you want to fill
1xn matrix denoting y coordinates of polygon covering the region that you want to fill
